text:
App Annie | Utrecht, The Netherlands (close to Amsterdam) | FULL-TIME | ONSITE | Multiple positions

App Annie is a global app market data and insights platform that you might have worked with before. We provide analytics services and market intelligence so that app developers can focus on making apps, not reports. In our Utrecht office (in The Netherlands), we concentrate on the development of consumer apps to learn more about the app industry.

We are expanding our mobile engineering and product teams with the following positions:

- Senior iOS Engineer: http://bit.ly/2GTdt6y

- Senior Android Engineer - SDK development: http://bit.ly/2ozNGK7

- Mobile QA Engineer: http://bit.ly/2GUlicm

- Product Manager: http://bit.ly/2FgjLjs

Do you want to work in a team of super talented people from different cultural backgrounds? We offer lots of responsibility in your role and room for you to grow with the company. Please email iperk-ext@appannie.com
